SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model

Class GroupManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.model.GroupManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGroupManager
public class GroupManager extends Object implements IGroupManager
Manager class for interacting with the group and directly connected entities to group, categories and viewUser. Has the basic CRUD methods for groups, also has extra methods that references a group or multiple groups. The manager uses other managers for objects and database interactions that don't directly correlate to groups. All dependencies are injected in the constructor.

    Constructs a groupManager with injected DAOs for group, category and viewUser take their own respective managers.

    • GroupManager

      public GroupManager(IGroupDAO groupDAO, ICategoryManager categoryManager, IViewUserManager viewUserManager)
      Constructs a groupManager with injected DAOs for group, category and viewUser take their own respective managers.
      Parameters:
      groupDAO - The injected groupDAO
      categoryManager - The injected categoryManager
      viewUserManager - The injected viewUserDAO

  • Method Details

    • addGroup

      public int addGroup(Group group)
      Creates a new group into the chosen DAO, e.g. Sqlite database. Uses the groupDAO method to add the group.
      Specified by:
      addGroup in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      group - The group to create.
      Returns:
      The newly created ID of the group. If the group already exists the existing group ID is returned.

    • updateGroup

      public void updateGroup(Group group)
      Update a group in the chosen DAO, e.g. Sqlite database. Uses the groupDAO method to update the group.
      Specified by:
      updateGroup in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      group - The group to update.

    • deleteGroup

      public void deleteGroup(Group group)
      Delete a group in the chosen DAO, e.g. Sqlite database. Uses the groupDAO method to delete the group.
      Specified by:
      deleteGroup in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      group - The group to delete.

    • getAllGroups

      public List<Group> getAllGroups()
      Get all groups in the database. Uses the groupDAO method getAllGroups.
      Specified by:
      getAllGroups in interface IGroupManager
      Returns:
      A list of all groups.

    • getUsers

      public List<User> getUsers(int groupID)
      Gets all the users that can view a group and puts them in a list. Uses the viewUserManager to get all users in the group. If no users are found the return value will be null.
      Specified by:
      getUsers in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      groupID - The group to get all users in.
      Returns:
      A list of all users with access to the group. Can be null

    • findUser

      public User findUser(String userEmail, int groupID)
      Finds a specific user in a group based on the users email. No other checks are made for the user except for its email.
      Specified by:
      findUser in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email to search for a user.
      groupID - The group which the search is made in.
      Returns:
      The user if found, otherwise null.

    • addUser

      public int addUser(User user, int groupID)
      Adds a user to be able to view a specific group Uses the viewUserManager to add a user to allow for database specific implementations.
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add to the group.
      groupID - The ID of the group to add the user to.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added user.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int userID, int groupID)
      Deletes a user from being able to view a group, it does not delete the actual user. If this method is called it should be assumed the user can no longer view the group.
      Specified by:
      deleteUser in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to delete from the group.
      groupID - The ID of the group the user should be deleted from.

    • getCategories

      public List<Category> getCategories(int groupID)
      Gets all the categories that are in a group. Uses the categoryManager to allow for multiple different implementations.
      Specified by:
      getCategories in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in.
      Returns:
      A list of the categories in the group.

    • findCategory

      public Category findCategory(String categoryName, int groupID)
      Searches and finds a specific category by its name in a group. No other checks are made for the category except that its name is identical to the chosen one and its in the group to search in.
      Specified by:
      findCategory in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      categoryName - The name of the category to search for, must be an exact name, no wildcards can be used.
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in.
      Returns:
      The category if found, otherwise null.

    • addCategory

      public int addCategory(Category category)
      Adds a new category to the database.
      Specified by:
      addCategory in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      category - The category to add
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added category.

    • deleteCategory

      public void deleteCategory(int categoryID)
      Deletes a category in the database.
      Specified by:
      deleteCategory in interface IGroupManager
      Parameters:
      categoryID - The ID of the category to delete.
